name: Cycles Per Second
description: Game made for Extra Credits Game Jam #3 for which the theme was Cycles. I interpreted it to mean keeping a machine running at a certain number of Cycles Per Second, hence the name and concept. I made everything for the game, except for the font, the licensing information for which is included in its folder. You may use this game for any purpose you see fit, and you may monetize any videos made about this game.
